 var priority = gr.getDisplayValue('priority');
 var short_description = gr.getValue('short_description');
 var description = gr.getValue('description');
 var state = gr.getDisplayValue('state');
 var category = gr.getDisplayValue('category');
 var assignment_group = gr.getDisplayValue('assignment_group');
 var fields = [];
 if (short_description != null && short_description != '')
 fields.push({ "fieldLabel": gr.getElement("short_description").getLabel(), "fieldValue": short_description });
 if (state != null && state != '')
 fields.push({ "fieldLabel": gr.getElement("state").getLabel(), "fieldValue": state });
 if (priority != null && priority != '')
 fields.push({ "fieldLabel": gr.getElement("priority").getLabel(), "fieldValue": priority });
 if (category != null && category != '')
 fields.push({ "fieldLabel": gr.getElement("category").getLabel(), "fieldValue": category });
 if (assignment_group != null && assignment_group != '')
 fields.push({ "fieldLabel": gr.getElement("assignment_group").getLabel(), "fieldValue": assignment_group });
 if (description != null && description != '')
 fields.push({ "fieldLabel": gr.getElement("description").getLabel(), "fieldValue": description });

 var data = JSON.stringify({
 "title": title,
 "fields": fields,
 "subtitle": eff_no,
 "url": link

 });
 return vaSystem.renderCard("Card", data);

})();
